summary: This is an email chain from October 21, 2020, regarding the assignment of two Surveillance Specialists to assist with the Epstein case. The communication involves coordination between a Program Manager/Squad Supervisor and others to direct the specialists to contact SA Young for further instructions and to set up a CAIR account for media review support.

persons.name: SA Young
persons.context: The person to whom two Surveillance Specialists are to be directed for further instructions regarding the Epstein case.

persons.name: Andy
persons.context: Copied on an internal email requesting two people to support media review for the Epstein case.

connections.description: Two Surveillance Specialists are to be directed to contact SA Young for further instructions on assisting with the Epstein case.

events.title: Assignment of Surveillance Specialists to Epstein Case
events.description: Internal email coordination to assign two Surveillance Specialists to assist with the Epstein case, directing them to contact SA Young for further instructions and to set up a CAIR account for media review support.

keyFacts: On October 21, 2020, two Surveillance Specialists were identified to assist with the Epstein case.
The specialists were instructed to contact SA Young for further direction.
The support requested was for a 'media review' related to the Epstein case.
The coordination involved setting up a CAIR account for the specialists.
